original_text:
He has raised up a horn of salvation for us
    in the house of his servant David
korean_text: 우리를 위하여 구원의 뿔을 그 종 다윗의 집에 일으키셨으니

sentences.original_text: He has raised up a horn of salvation for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 위해 구원의 뿔을 일으키셨다

sentences.original_text: in the house of his servant David
